Today in County Clare, it's looking solid with 10 ft @ 13s W swell and fresh 16 mph SSW winds. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering clean conditions during their respective tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 12 ft @ 13s W but with fresh 19 mph W winds, making it poor across the board. The day after, swell eases to 6 ft @ 10s W with strong 22 mph WNW winds, still not producing. Best: today.
